title: Flexibility Foundations
label: FLEXIBILITY FOUNDATIONS
description1: This is where we build the fundamentals. You'll learn proper warm-up sequences, understand the difference between active and passive stretching, and develop body awareness that translates to every other movement practice.
description2: Each class includes breathwork, targeted muscle activation, and progressive stretching protocols designed to create lasting change. Expect to leave understanding why certain stretches work and others don't.
